mapper.select: SELECT sod.order_detail_num, sod.order_detail_isbn, sod.order_detail_title, sod.order_detail_qty, sod.order_detail_received_qty, so.order_date FROM Supplier_Order_Details sod JOIN Supplier_Orders so ON sod.order_num = so.order_num WHERE sod.order_num = #{order_num}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO inventory inv USING ( SELECT #{order_detail_isbn} AS inv_isbn, #{order_detail_title} AS inv_title, #{order_detail_qty} AS inv_qty, #{zone_num} AS zone_num FROM dual ) src ON (inv.inv_isbn = src.inv_isbn) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET inv.inv_qty = inv.inv_qty + src.inv_qty, inv.zone_num = src.zone_num WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (inv.inv_isbn, inv.inv_title, inv.inv_qty, inv.inv_registration_date, inv.zone_num) VALUES (src.inv_isbn, src.inv_title, src.inv_qty, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, src.zone_num)

INSERT INTO Inventory_Log ( log_transaction_num, manager_id, log_transaction_status, log_operation_date, order_num ) VALUES ( INVENTORY_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{manager_id}, '01', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{order_num} )

INSERT INTO Inventory_Log_Details ( log_detail_num, log_detail_isbn, log_detail_title, log_detail_qty, zone_num, log_transaction_num ) VALUES ( INVENTORY_LOG_DETAILS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{order_detail_isbn}, #{order_detail_title}, #{order_detail_qty}, #{zone_num}, #{log_transaction_num} )
